body:
I would like to hear whether anybody has a concern about `import p.N` other than the syntax.

I kind of like `export` but it requires defining an additional top-level keyword.  This can be done but is awkward.  Another possibility would be

    var p.V
    const p.C
    type p.T
    func p.F

The idea here is that if the top-level keyword `var`, `const`, `type`, or `func` is followed by a qualified identifier, it means that that identifier is re-exported.  This syntax too is not great, but it doesn't require an additional keyword.
